findings.message: BogDistributive._stake(address,uint256) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#557-571) ignores return value by _pair.transferFrom(account,address(this),amount) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#558)
findings.name: unchecked-transfer

findings.message: BogDistributive._unstake(address,uint256) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#576-592) ignores return value by _pair.transfer(account,amount) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#586)
findings.name: unchecked-transfer

findings.message:
Burnable._txBurn(address,uint256) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#718-725) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-toBurn = txAmount.mul(_burnRate).div(1000) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#719)
	-_distribute(account,toBurn.mul(_distributeRatio - 1).div(_distributeRatio)) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#721)
findings.name: divide-before-multiply

findings.message:
Ownable.transferOwnership(address).adr (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#218) lacks a zero-check on :
		- _owner = adr (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#219)
findings.name: missing-zero-check

findings.message: BogDistributive._unstake(address,uint256) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#576-592) has external calls inside a loop: _pair.transfer(account,amount) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#586)
findings.name: calls-loop

findings.message: BogdabotController.bogdabotTxHook(address,address,uint256) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#302-310) has external calls inside a loop: IBogdabot(_bogdabots[i]).txHook(msg.sender,sender,receiver,amount) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#308)
findings.name: calls-loop

findings.message:
Reentrancy in BogDistributive._unstake(address,uint256) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#576-592):
	External calls:
	- _pair.transfer(account,amount) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#586)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- updateHoldersUnstaked(account) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#589)
		- _holders[i] = _holders[_holders.length - 1] (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#390)
		- _holders.pop() (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#391)
	- updateHoldersUnstaked(account) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#589)
		- _holdersCount -- (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#396)
	- updateHoldersUnstaked(account) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#589)
		- _holdings[account].holding = false (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#384)
		- _holdings[_holders[i]].adrIndex = i (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#394)
findings.name: reentrancy-benign

findings.message:
Reentrancy in BogDistributive._stake(address,uint256) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#557-571):
	External calls:
	- _pair.transferFrom(account,address(this),amount) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#558)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _realise(account) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#561)
		- _balances[account] = _balances[account].add(amount) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#537)
	- updateHoldersStaked(account) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#568)
		- _holders.push(account) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#376)
	- updateHoldersStaked(account) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#568)
		- _holdersCount ++ (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#377)
	- updateHoldersStaked(account) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#568)
		- _holdings[account].holding = true (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#374)
		- _holdings[account].adrIndex = _holders.length (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#375)
	- _realise(account) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#561)
		- _stakes[account].realised = _stakes[account].realised.add(amount) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#538)
		- _stakes[account].excludedAmt = _totalFees (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#541)
	- _stakes[account].LP = _stakes[account].LP.add(amount) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#564)
	- _totalLP = _totalLP.add(amount) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#565)
	- _realise(account) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#561)
		- _totalRealised = _totalRealised.add(amount) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#539)
findings.name: reentrancy-benign

findings.message:
Reentrancy in BogDistributive._stake(address,uint256) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#557-571):
	External calls:
	- _pair.transferFrom(account,address(this),amount) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#558)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Staked(account,amount) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#570)
findings.name: reentrancy-events

findings.message:
Reentrancy in BOG20._transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#816-848):
	External calls:
	- bogdabotTxHook(sender,recipient,amount) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#844)
		- IBogdabot(_bogdabots[i]).txHook(msg.sender,sender,receiver,amount) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#308)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Transfer(sender,recipient,sendAmt) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#846)
findings.name: reentrancy-events

findings.message:
Reentrancy in BogDistributive._unstake(address,uint256) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#576-592):
	External calls:
	- _pair.transfer(account,amount) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#586)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Unstaked(account,amount) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#591)
findings.name: reentrancy-events

findings.message:

	- INLINE ASM (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#320-322)

BogDistributive._distribute(address,uint256) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#608-611) has costly operations inside a loop:

findings.name: costly-loop

findings.message:
Burnable._burn(address,uint256) (../..0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099.sol#738-746) has costly operations inside a loop:
